items.summary: Add detailed content for 'Dental Check-up & Cleaning' service expansion including: Procedure description 'Digital X-ray aur danton ki gehrai se safai (Scaling)', Benefit 'Cavity aur masoodon ki bimari se bachav', Time duration 'Sirf 30-45 minute', and a CTA button 'Abhi check-up schedule karein' that navigates to the booking page

Add detailed content for 'Root Canal Treatment (RCT)' service expansion including: Procedure 'Sade hue hisse ko saaf karke danton ko bachana', Special feature 'Single-sitting painless procedure (bin dard ke)', Benefit 'Asli daant ko nikaalne se bachata hai', and CTA button 'Dard se chutkara paayein' that navigates to the booking page

Add detailed content for 'Dental Implants' service expansion including: Procedure 'Titanium post ke saath naye majboot daant lagana', Longevity 'Ye zindagi bhar saath dete hain', Benefit 'Khane-peene aur bolne mein asli danton jaisa mehsoos hota hai', and CTA button 'Apni muskurahat wapas paayein' that navigates to the booking page

Add detailed content for 'Teeth Whitening' service expansion including: Procedure 'Advanced laser technology se peelepan ko hatana', Result 'Pehle hi session mein 3-4 shades safed daant', Benefit 'Shaadi ya party ke liye turant chamak', and an appropriate CTA button that navigates to the booking page

Ensure the remaining services (Braces & Aligners and Pediatric Dentistry) also have expandable sections with similar structured content including procedure, benefits, and CTAs that navigate to the booking page, maintaining consistency with the other four services

Convert the existing ServicesSection component to use an accordion/expandable card pattern where each service card can be clicked to expand and reveal detailed information below the service title and description
